reviewtext: I had my HDTV and DVD and some other electronics connected to an older surge protector that was still fully protecting my equipment but felt that it was time to move up with the HDTV involved.I like the design it allows for those transformer plugs that take up so much space. The color code is nice and I used as applied but I don't have all the things labeled, that is okay used them for other items.It has enough coverage for my items and if there should be a loss I would get enough money to get new items.I feel better protected over my 15yr old surge protector that I have no idea where the proof of purchase is anymore and I know it probably will not cover an HDTV.I plan to get another to replace a second older version.The hardest thing about this is not set up it is getting the clam shell case cut off. :)
summary: Pleased with design and promised protection.
